item.title: Segre chart (Table of nuclides)
item.author: blazeva1 -a- fit.cvut.cz <Václav Blažej> (Václav Blažej)
item.description: Decades of effort and millions of dollars compressed into a table that shows base blocks of our universe:  ↗ Table of nuclides ↗ depicts elements of the periodic table in the first axis and their isotopes in the second axis. The first exposition to it I had was the excelent BobbyBroccoli video about “a guy who faked an element”. Explore it yourself. A few websites that have a reasonable interactive chart are:
